content: **grab the free pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** i have received many requests to create a pattern like my simple double_crochet hat but for dk weight yarn or light weight yarn 3 **this is the dk double_crochet hat pattern ** all sizes are available for free on my blog i have included 2 different lengths mid-ear length and base-of-earlobe length i hope this pattern helps all of you who like to use light weight yarn > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
